pages.title: Industrial Assembler
pages.notes: The $(item)Industrial Assembler$() can manufacture most of the things you used to do manually in the $(item)Engineer's Workbench$(), along with some new ones.$(br2)Forgot about $(l:portal_hub/4_schematica)Schematica$() yet?

pages.title: Portal Stone
pages.text: Once you have assembled the assembler you can manufacture the Portal block.$(br2)Reach the Combat Simulation and stand by for further instructions.

pages.title: Portal Activator
pages.text: Lighting the $(item)Portal$() to the fourth $(item)Simulation$() requires you to hold a $(item)Charged Staff$() with full power.
